page.title: 06Education - Playtime
page.content: { Games Played in the Playground. One of the games we play at school is called 'Hey,Mr Crocodile'. One person stands about 5 metres away from the other people who chant "Hey,Mr Crocodile, May we cross the water, To see your ugly daughter, Just like you." And Mr Crocodile answers "Only if you're wearing..." And he says a colour and anyone wearing that colour can go across to the other side - all the others have to try to cross and the person who is caught by Mr Crocodile is 'on'. {Our favourite games are:- Polo Red Letters Had Black Magic Around the town Stuck in the Mud Mr Crocodile Forty-forty F.A. Cup Hide'n'Seek Hop Scotch Bulldog
